title: Formula for $$x_n$$
text: Use the formula $$x_n=F\left(x_n-1\right)$$ to define subsequent numbers $$x_n$$.
speech: Use the formula  x sub n is equal to   f of, parentheses x sub n minus 1,   to define subsequent numbers  x sub n .

to define subsequent numbers   x sub n

title: Formula With $$n=5$$
text: To find $$x_5$$, use the formula $$x_n=F\left(x_n-1\right)$$ with $$n=5$$ and the value of $$x_4$$ stored on the calculator.
speech: To find  x sub 5 , use the formula  x sub n, is equal to   f of, parentheses x sub n minus 1,   with  n is equal to, 5  and the value of  x sub 4  stored on the calculator.
